exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type F : IndexedFamily False T Unable to unify "Full_set ?M1668" with "IndexedIntersection F = Full_set".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (T : Type) (F : IndexedFamily False T), IndexedIntersection F = Full_set

Premises:
ClassicalFacts.F : forall A : Prop, ClassicalFacts.has_fixpoint A -> (A -> A) -> A
IndexedFamily = fun A T : Type => A -> Ensemble T : Type -> Type -> Type Arguments IndexedFamily (_ _)%type_scope
Inductive False : Prop := 
IndexedIntersection : forall A T : Type, IndexedFamily A T -> Ensemble T
subfamily_intersection : forall (T : Type) (F G : Family T), Included F G -> Included (FamilyIntersection G) (FamilyIntersection F)
IndexedIntersection_sind : forall (A T : Type) (F : IndexedFamily A T) (P : T -> SProp), (forall x : T, (forall a : A, In (F a) x) -> P x) -> forall t : T, IndexedIntersection F t -> P t
IndexedIntersection_ind : forall (A T : Type) (F : IndexedFamily A T) (P : T -> Prop), (forall x : T, (forall a : A, In (F a) x) -> P x) -> forall t : T, IndexedIntersection F t -> P t
family_intersection_intro : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (x : T), (forall S : Ensemble T, In F S -> In S x) -> In (FamilyIntersection F) x
IndexedUnion_sind : forall (A T : Type) (F : IndexedFamily A T) (P : T -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (x : T), In (F a) x -> P x) -> forall t : T, IndexedUnion F t -> P t
IndexedUnion_ind : forall (A T : Type) (F : IndexedFamily A T) (P : T -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (x : T), In (F a) x -> P x) -> forall t : T, IndexedUnion F t -> P t
FamilyUnion_ind : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (P : T -> Prop), (forall (S : Ensemble T) (x : T), In F S -> In S x -> P x) -> forall t : T, FamilyUnion F t -> P t
FamilyUnion_sind : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (P : T -> SProp), (forall (S : Ensemble T) (x : T), In F S -> In S x -> P x) -> forall t : T, FamilyUnion F t -> P t
indexed_union_intro : forall (A T : Type) (F : IndexedFamily A T) (a : A) (x : T), In (F a) x -> In (IndexedUnion F) x
indexed_intersection_intro : forall (A T : Type) (F : IndexedFamily A T) (x : T), (forall a : A, In (F a) x) -> In (IndexedIntersection F) x
Inductive FamilyUnion (T : Type) (F : Family T) : Ensemble T := family_union_intro : forall (S : Ensemble T) (x : T), In F S -> In S x -> In (FamilyUnion F) x Arguments FamilyUnion [T]%type_scope Arguments family_union_intro [T]%type_scope
Inductive IndexedUnion (A T : Type) (F : IndexedFamily A T) : Ensemble T := indexed_union_intro : forall (a : A) (x : T), In (F a) x -> In (IndexedUnion F) x Arguments IndexedUnion [A T]%type_scope Arguments indexed_union_intro [A T]%type_scope
FamilyIntersection_sind : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (P : T -> SProp), (forall x : T, (forall S : Ensemble T, In F S -> In S x) -> P x) -> forall t : T, FamilyIntersection F t -> P t
FamilyIntersection_ind : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (P : T -> Prop), (forall x : T, (forall S : Ensemble T, In F S -> In S x) -> P x) -> forall t : T, FamilyIntersection F t -> P t
Inductive FamilyIntersection (T : Type) (F : Family T) : Ensemble T := family_intersection_intro : forall x : T, (forall S : Ensemble T, In F S -> In S x) -> In (FamilyIntersection F) x Arguments FamilyIntersection [T]%type_scope Arguments family_intersection_intro [T]%type_scope _ [x] _%function_scope
sub_indexed_intersection : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (F : IndexedFamily ?B ?T), let subF := fun a : ?A => F (f a) in Included (IndexedIntersection F) (IndexedIntersection subF) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type] ?T : [ |- Type]
sub_indexed_union : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (F : IndexedFamily ?B ?T), let subF := fun a : ?A => F (f a) in Included (IndexedUnion subF) (IndexedUnion F) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type] ?T : [ |- Type]
Inductive Full_set (U : Type) : Ensemble U := Full_intro : forall x : U, In Full_set x Arguments Full_set {U}%type_scope Arguments Full_intro _%type_scope
Full_intro : forall (U : Type) (x : U), In Full_set x
empty_family_intersection : forall T : Type, FamilyIntersection Empty_set = Full_set
FiniteT_nat_cardinal_cond : forall (X : Type) (H : FiniteT X) (n : nat), cardinal X Full_set n -> FiniteT_nat_cardinal X H = n
FiniteT_nat_cardinal_def : forall (X : Type) (H : FiniteT X), cardinal X Full_set (FiniteT_nat_cardinal X H)
Full_set_sind : forall (U : Type) (P : U -> SProp), (forall x : U, P x) -> forall u : U, Full_set u -> P u
Full_set_ind : forall (U : Type) (P : U -> Prop), (forall x : U, P x) -> forall u : U, Full_set u -> P u
FiniteT_img : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> (forall y1 y2 : Y, y1 = y2 \/ y1 <> y2) -> Finite Y (Im Full_set f)
Inductive FiniteT : Type -> Prop := empty_finite : FiniteT False | add_finite : forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> FiniteT (option T) | bij_finite : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> invertible f -> FiniteT Y Arguments FiniteT _%type_scope Arguments add_finite _%type_scope Arguments bij_finite (_ _)%type_scope _%function_scope
FiniteT_has_nat_cardinal : forall X : Type, FiniteT X -> exists ! n : nat, cardinal X Full_set n
FiniteT_ind : forall P : Type -> Prop, P False -> (forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> P T -> P (option T)) -> (forall (X Y : Type) (f1 : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> P X -> invertible f1 -> P Y) -> forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> P T
Seminus_Empty_set_l : forall (A : Type) (s : Ensemble A), Setminus Empty_set s = Empty_set
Intersection_Empty_set_l : forall (A : Type) (s : Ensemble A), Intersection Empty_set s = Empty_set

```coq
intros T F x. apply Full_intro.
Qed.
```
